column4: what's the matter if xrandr does not detect a plugged vga monitor?
do you mean you don't have an option as far as display depths and sizes?
he only displays my laptop display
to find out, which devices are plugged
i have gutsy with intel 945GM and xserver 1.3
everything should work fine, i intel does not lie, imaginator
the video card driver you have may not be compatible with the xrandr extension.
there are official howtos by intel
oh, so are you sure you're using the proper Intel driver in your /etc/X11/xorg.conf?
the official driver by intel is free software
so you're trying to do a config-less X11?
i want to do it by randr - dynamically
